controls.title: Information duties & transparency for data subjects

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Provide precise, intelligible and easily accessible information; comply with access/notification duties.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Implementation guidance: define responsibilities, processes, systems/services, and evidence; perform regular effectiveness checks.

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: Verify processes/documentation are current, approved, communicated.

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: Verify technical/organizational controls are implemented and evidenced.

parts.name: objective
parts.prose: Verify monitoring/reporting and corrective actions are established.

parts.name: criteria
parts.prose: Documentation exists, current, approved.

parts.name: criteria
parts.prose: Effectiveness evidenced by tests/sampling.

parts.name: criteria
parts.prose: Roles/responsibilities named; SLAs/KPIs met.
